title: Decorative Design with Clown, Elephant, and Ballerina
provenance: Galleria d'arte Cortina di Renzo Cortina, Piazza Cavour 1 Milan
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and blue-gray wash on cream paper, mounted
description: Three figures sketched in outline:  a clown with hands and legs splayed on top; elephant with umbrulla, in middle; ballerina in dress before large circular frame, at bottom.  Sheet is mounted to paper with two framing lines around edges.
name: Drawing
